experiences.description: Technical lead in the development and maintenance of the Avax PSI and Avax PSI Mapeamento platforms. Creator and primary responsible for Carina, a chatbot focused on psychological assessment and structured data collection. Developed a risk alert system capable of automatically identifying critical indicators such as suicide risk and harassment signals, sending real-time notifications to companies. Direct experience integrating artificial intelligence models for response classification, semantic analysis, and detection of sensitive behavioral patterns.
responsibilities: Architecture definition based on DDD and Clean Architecture
Integration with AI models for natural language processing and risk classification
Design of flows using MCP (Model Context Protocol) for agent and automation integration
Backend development with Java and Ruby on Rails
Database modeling and maintenance using PostgreSQL and MySQL
Unit testing with JUnit and Jest

experiences.description: Responsible for the architecture, implementation, and evolution of the backend of a job platform. Technical leadership in Java and Spring Boot backend, defining standards and code organization, developing REST APIs and core business rules. Contributed to the structuring of integrations with intelligent services and AI-based automations to support internal processes.
responsibilities: Implementation of authentication and authorization mechanisms
Application of DDD and Clean Architecture principles
Code reviews and best practices enforcement
Integration with AI services for automation and data enrichment
Design of APIs prepared for intelligent agent integration

experiences.description: Mid-level freelance developer working on the Paiperon and Here products. Focused on performance optimization, maintenance, and functional evolution of the platforms, emphasizing scalability and user experience. Participated in structuring integrations with external services and experimenting with AI-based tools to support internal workflows.
responsibilities: Experimentation with AI tools for workflow automation

experiences.description: Full-stack development of an AI-based solution for forecasting and optimizing sales and purchasing decisions in supermarkets. Built analytical dashboards for data visualization and business metrics. Experience integrating predictive models and data processing pipelines to support decision-making.
responsibilities: Backend development with Spring Boot and .NET
Unit testing with JUnit, xUnit, and Jest

experiences.description: Participant in the Crescer training program, developing web applications and REST APIs. Intensive practice with Clean Architecture, DDD, TDD, and microservices. Exposure to distributed systems fundamentals and workflow automation, along with initial experimentation with intelligent service integrations.
responsibilities: REST API development with Spring Boot and .NET
Database usage with PostgreSQL and SQLite
Application of architectural patterns (DDD, TDD, Onion)
